Text: Can`t unrar the file. Has anyone got the same problem. WinRar says that the archive is empty. Any advice?

Yeah, I downloaded this just out of curiosity, because I have PCSX2 v1.0 + a heap of plugins + a heap of  bios files, when compressed it is 17.9mb & 87.4mb uncompressed; there's no reason this should be 143.33mb compressed. All you get with this torrent is an error message stating that it's either broken or wrong format, don't bother with this torrent, a complete waste of time.
